content: let sstayhomesocks knitsiphappy2022 1 thispatternisforpersonaluseonly pattern notes glossary you can insert any heel and toe that is your ● co - cast on i love the german preference this pattern is written to be knit twisted cast on for a stretchy cuff on any style of needles…magic loop ● k - knit dpn s 16 or 9 circulars ● p - purl ● eor - end of round the stitch pattern is an easy cabled panel ● k2tog - knit two stitches together just on the front of the socks the cable ● ssk - slip one stitch as if to knit slip stitches are fun to do with or without a cable the next stitch as if to purl insert the needle i have included a video tutorial link left hand needle through the front of showing my method without a cable needle these stitches and knit them together through their back loops ● 2/2 lc - 2/2 left cross slip two sizing stitches to a cable needle and hold small 56 stitch medium 64 stitch large 72 to the front of the work knit two stitch stitches from the left needle knit two 7 8 9 inches / 18 20 25 23 cm stitches from the cable needle approximate foot circumference ● bor - beginning of round ● st/sts - stitch/stitches materials ● sl - slip_stitch purl wise ● repeat - repeat ● _ - repeat stitches inside 100g & 20g of any fingering weight sock yarn video tutorials sample is knit in the creative knitter classic sock set 75/25 merino nylon german twisted cast on tutorial by very pink knits needles knitting help - slow motion german t… 2 25 mm / us 1 or size needed to obtain cable stitches with no cable needle correct gauge https //youtu be/ynjjvrcfcxy gauge 32 stitches over 4 10cm stockinette on 2 25mm needle notions tapestry needle stitch markers cable needle optional let sstayhomesocks knitsiphappy2022 2 thispatternisforpersonaluseonly cuff garter edge slip_stitch heel with cc cast on 56 64 72 stitches join to your heel flap will be worked flat across half knit in the round of your total stitches 28 32 36 tip work the first 2 stitches of your ribbing k across instep sts in pattern 28 32 36 with your tail and working yarn held together to make your cast on edge smooth join cc now but do not cut your mc round 1 *k1 p1* repeat to end of round cut row 1 k3 sl1 k1 to last 3 sts k3 cc row 2 k3 p across row to last 3 sts k3 round 2 k all stitches in mc to avoid visible purl bumps repeat row 1 & 2 a total of 14 16 18 round 3-15 *k1 p1* repeat to end of round times you will end with a total of 28 32 36 row on your heel flap leg tip the easiest way to count your repeats see charts on pg 5-6 is to
